Do not assume Aggressive

Be prepared: 
• Be aware of high risk patients e.g. those known
wi
th previous violence, substance misuse, public

• Step-wise protocol to ensure safety of the
patient and all in the clinic.
• Clear roles for all staff members.
• Triage plan for early signs of aggression.
• Available backup – security, SAPS and EMS.
